name: Mia Kong
title: Co-Head of Tech
desc: Mia is a senior in Mechanical Engineering. In her free time, she likes to read as well as cook, especially when it comes to trying out new recipes. A fun fact about her is that she has five Blahajs!

name: Vi Vu
title: Co-Head of Tech
desc: Vi is a junior studying computer science. In her free time, she likes to listen to a random assortment of music, play video games, build keyboards, and fall into rabbit holes.

name: Max Wang
title: Co-Head of Tech
desc: Max is a senior in ABTech interested in (but not good at!) lighting, sound, stage management and media. In his free time, he enjoys playing video games, watching anime and staying in his room.

name: Wellington Jiang
title: Equipment Manager
desc: Wellington is a senior studying ECE with a minor in math. Within AB Tech, he is interested in sound, rigging and driving golf carts. In his free time, Wellington likes to take photos, blast music, read and sleep.

name: Fletcher Sun
title: Co-Finance Chair
desc: I'm Fletcher, a senior majoring in Stats/ML and IRP. I mainly do lighting on tech. In my free time, I like to watch soccer and formula 1, despite teams that I support routinely ruin my whole week in 90 minutes/2hrs. For music, I'm a fan of J-pop, incl. Ado and TogeToge ( though happened to missed all their recent concerts because of CMU finals).

name: Neil Makur
title: Co-Finance Chair
desc: Neil is a sophomore studying computer science. Within tech he usually does lighting, and you can probably find him sitting on top of the subs reading a random textbook.

name: Tucker Shea
title: Personnel Manager
desc: Tucker is a junior studying Electrical and Computer Engineering. He especially enjoys Media-ing and TiCing, love to hike, and can often be found reading science fiction. His favorite moments are story time with techies and tech alums.

name: Alice Zhang
title: Internal Operations Chair
desc: Alice is a sophomore studying Information Systems with a minor in Music Technology. She likes to build custom keyboards, song write, play basketball, and collect Pokemon cards. She has the cutest cat in the world and will be taking no objections.

name: Benjamin Streck
title: Repair & Maintenance Chair
desc: I am an ECE major, with a minor in Drama (Technical Direction). I also enjoy amateur radio, and eating extremely spicy food.

name: Shannon Lee
title: Social Chair
desc: Shannon is a BHA junior studying art and film. In her free time, she enjoys going to cafes and having an everything bagels with jalapeno cream cheese or a red bean mochi bun.

name: Percival
title: Mascot
desc: Percival is our favorite and fluffiest techie! With over 2 decades of knowledge, it enjoys being a vital member in all lighting and sound events. Whether it's for moral support or late-night contemplation, Percival is here for all of us, all the time ʕっ•ᴥ•ʔっ
